name: FNAB
description:
Prototype of factorio like game to raise awarness of elderly peoples difficulties of eating food.

Currently there is no "gameplay" objective as this is our first time attempting a game jam.  The idea is that during daytime, you serve customers that have not only difference preferences, but also some requirements in order for them to be able to eat the food (like presentation, texture or consistency). During the night time cycle, you would be able to build in essence a construction that would aid you in processing food quicker with the help of machines and conveyorbelts. The game could potentially include a sandbox as well as a story mode (although neither exists in this prototype).

The setting is supposed to be a restaurant in an elderly care facility where the restaurant is called Bettys, and therefore the name of the game is Five nights at Betty's.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
change between night and day - N
In night mode change between objects being placed - F and  R
Rotate object - Q and R
Left click mouse to place selected item
Right click mouse to remove selected item
